history.text: HELLO
SO WHAT MOVIE DOCUMENT DID YOU READ?
Hi, do you watch alot of movies? today I am talking baout a sandra bullock movie
I DO! I LOVE MOVIES. I DON'T CARE FOR SANDRA BULLOCK TOO MUCH THOUGH.
WHAT IS THE MOVIE ABOUT?
This is a really good movie, about sports, basically about an offensive line man named Michael Other
OOH! THE BLIND SIDE! ONE OF MY FAVORITES! NOW I WANT TO WATCH IT AGAIN!
IS IT ON TV ANY TIME SOON?
OR DO YOU KNOW WHERE THEY MIGHT SELL IT IN STORES?
Yes, many people were positive ad it had good reviews based on what I am reading.
I'M GOING TO SEE IF I CAN RENT IT FROM A REDBOX OR SOMETHING. IF NOT, I'M DEFINITELY GOING TO BUY IT!
I'M HONESTLY SO EXCITED, I HAVEN'T SEEN IT IN SO LONG. I DONT REMEMBER THE STORY EXACTLY, BUT I REMEMBER LOVING IT THE WHOLE TIME I WAS WATCHING IT. DO YOU REMEMBER HOW IT STARTS?
I love this movie also, I also never realized that the guy who played the Dad was Tim Mcgraw
I LOVE HIS MUSIC!
WHAT'S YOUR FAVORITE PART OF THE MOVIE?
I love when Sandra Bullock realizes that Mike is homeless and brings him home. And of course when he got his own bed, it made me cry
YEAH, IT'S A VERY EMOTIONAL MOVIE, FOR SURE.
SUCH A GREAT STORYLINE.
Mikes home life mad me so sad, I liked how he bonded with sj
YEAH, SJ IS SO ADORABLE! MIKE WAS SUCH A SWEETHEART.
THEY PICKED GREAT ACTORS FOR THAT MOVIE.
No doubt, I have often thought of reading the book Mike wrote called The Blind Side Evolution of a game, just cause I loved the movie so much
oh, wow, i didn't even know there was a book out!
that's incredible. i love to read! i wonder if the blind side was based on a book first?
I would like to read it but I just don't get sports. Quinton Abton was Big Mike though, he played that part so well.
it is more about caring for others than sports, in my honest opinion. and yes, he did extremely well portraying the character! i hope he won an awarad from it!

I hope so too. I also loved Kathy Bates as his tutor it was such a different role for her. I got upset that I know these situations really happens with kids being homeles
s .
yes! she was great at it!
i know, i wish there was a way that everyone could just help out.
I was tense that he had to get some a rise in grade point average to stay in school. It made me sad about Michael being placed in foster care at 7 because his mom was a drug adict
omg yes, that was scary cause i know he wanted to play football so bad! and it was messed up when they tried to make it seem like the parents were just using him for football.
Yes it was, along with the way Sandra Bullocks friends all were aghast that she took in this large colored boy and her daughter may not be safe
oh yeah! like when they were laughing at the family portrait! that wasn't right at all.

I know it addressed alot of problems that are prevelant in our society including that scene you mentioned where Michael is questioned about where he wants to go school and the Tuchy;s influencing his  choice
EXACTLY IT WAS A GREAT MOVIE TO MAKE.
Looking at the notes it seemed like it didn't get really great reviews thougn it was a tear jerker and I am defiinitely watching this soon.
YEAH, I'M GONNA TRY TO FIND IT IN THE STORE TONIGHT WHEN I GOT SHOPPING SO THAT I CAN WATCH IT TOMORROW.

Cool, I will too.! I really don;t get football-;like at all the onl
y way I understood what Mike was supposed to do when his Mom told him he must protect his quarterback.

uid1response.feedback: This was a great conversation but how do you not reference a movie you've seen a million times?

uid2response.feedback: I LOVE THE MOVIE THAT WAS TALKED ABOUT
